'''Celondim''' is a city in the [[Ered Luin]] in the game ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]].

Here [[Elves|Elven]] players are dropped once they have completed the tutorial.

==History==
Celondim is city located at the Sout of the Blue Mountains along the river [[Lune]]. Originally, it was a port to ferry wood to [[Mithlond]] to build ships, but now there is one of the bigger cities in the area. [[Duillond]], to the north, is smaller and it is founded by people of [[Edhelion]], because after [[Skorgrím]] destroyed their city they relocated to [[Gondamon]], which they have left for Duillond to dwell nearer to the [[Lhûn]] and the Sea.<ref>{{LOTROW|Gondamon#Lore|2025-08-13}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Celondim means "sad stream flowing down from heights", because [[Celon#Etymology|celon]] means the "stream flowing down from heights"<ref>{{S|Index}}, entry "Celon"</ref> and [[dim]] means "sad".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry "DEM"</ref>
